docs.description: Documentation for the Hologram base schema

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: hologram.spec defines the minimal required structure that every artifact in the Hologram system must have. It is self-referential - its own spec file validates against itself.

sections.title: Required Fields
sections.content:
namespace: Unique identifier for the component
parent: The parent component's namespace (optional for root)
conformance: Whether this is a conformance file
version: Semantic version of the component
description: Human-readable description

sections.title: Self-Reference
sections.content: The hologram.spec.spec file contains these exact fields, making it self-validating. This bootstrap property ensures the system is grounded in itself.
